effect.shortEffect: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
effect.full: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.

description.x-y: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.
description.sun-moon: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
description.sword-shield: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
